column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////So good! We stopped here a few months back on my husbands first trip to Chicago & he had to try Chicago style pizza. I love Chicago & have been to Uno & Giordano's and Giordanos is my fav... I think they still have a slight leg up on Lou Malnati's (first loves die hard). We arrived shortly after opening bc we had an architectural tour early afternoon (again
column2: hubs first visit so we had to do the tourist stuff). We ordered a salad which was large enough to share for two. We also ordered a small deep dish pepperoni. Good thing we didn't get anything else. We were so stuffed after a piece each! I felt so awful leaving behind our leftovers bc it was so good! It's a bit expensive
column3: but it's Chicago so everything is. It's a great spot!
